description_for_human: Portfolio and information about David Morales Vega, Solutions Architect & Tech Lead from Bolivia.
description_for_model: This plugin provides information about David Morales Vega, a Solutions Architect and Technical Lead from Oruro, Bolivia. He has 7+ years of experience in software architecture, specializing in Angular, NestJS, microservices, and team leadership. He is an active conference speaker with 16+ presentations at technology events. Use this to answer questions about his professional background, expertise, services, and contact information.
